actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend section 6096 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to permit cancellations of the dollar checkoff to the Presidential Election Campaign Fund.

summary.text: Permits the cancellation of the dollar checkoff to the Presidential Election Campaign Fund within 3 years after the time required for filing of the income tax return on which such checkoff was made under the Internal Revenue Code of 1954.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 6096 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to permit cancellations of the dollar checkoff to the Presidential Election Campaign Fund.
